Simple_Ldap_Api 1.0¶

Contents:

Requeriments¶

  • python 2.7
  • install libsasl2-dev python-dev libldap2-dev libssl-dev
  • pip install python-ldap

Documentation¶

Decorators¶

functions.decorators.requiere(*types)¶

This decorator, evaluates that the types pass in a method to be correct

Convert and Verify Functions¶

Note

You should know about distinguished name (dn) and your structure

See also

https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa366101(v=vs.85).aspx

functions.convert.is_domain_dn(dn) → boolean¶

this function verifies if you dn is a dn with only domainComponent

functions.convert.is_domain_url(domain_url) → boolean¶

this function verifies if is url

functions.convert.to_distinguished_name(domain_url) → String¶

this function converts domain to dn with only domainComponent

functions.convert.to_domain(dn) → String¶

this function converts dn with only domainComponent to domain
